ygData.subject: RE: Group damage - was Revised? Patch Update today
ygData.msgSnippet: errr...sorry to break the news but Middle Earth had the carpet pulled out from under it and it is gone.
ygData.messageBody:
errr...sorry to break the news but Middle Earth had the carpet pulled out
from under it and it is gone.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: RON_TALBOT@...
> [mailto:RON_TALBOT@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 4:58 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Group damage - was Revised? Patch Update today
>
>
> From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> This is very sad. I was shocked when I found out this
> wasn't the way
> it worked to begin with. Does Verant condone kill
> stealing? Does
> Verant want to discourage grouping and promote obnoxious necro
> soloing? What's the deal here? The less people want to
> group the
> harder it is to be a bard...
>
> Bujold (waiting for the middle earth mfrp)
> Xegony
> 21st level (only took one week to level - a record!)
>
>
> ______________________________ Reply Separator
> _________________________________
> Subject: [eqbards] Revised? Patch Update today
> Author: Non-HP-sklug (sklug@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
> Date: 9/28/1999 11:17 AM
>
>
> From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>
>
> Did they revise the patch message? It now says the group
> damage getting
> the exp only has been applied to the Fennin Ro server. Those
> bums! How
> long have we all been waiting for this change? *sigh*
>
> Laluni Songhammer, 27th level bard of E'Ci
> (who has been campaigning for this since Phase 1 beta)
> Steven S. Klug
> -- sklug@...
>
>
